= Required and recommended software =

I use all software and these versions, other software or version are your own responsability

  * Eclipse Indigo or another IDE: http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/

  * Subversion for version control or Mercurial with hgsubversion 
extension: http://subversion.tigris.org/ and http://tortoisesvn.tigris.org/ or http://tortoisehg.bitbucket.org/ and http://mercurial.selenic.com/wiki/WorkingWithSubversion

  * Maven 2.2.1 for building: http://maven.apache.org/
